truths: Move the green square block B1 to the top left corner.
Move to bottom and pick up block B1 and move to top left with block B1
Grab B1 and move up to the top left corner
Move block B1 to the top left of the arena.
cot:
The ground truth goals all specify that block B1, which is a green square block, should be moved to the top left corner of the arena. The predicted goal only states "Pick up B1" without specifying where to move it afterward.

Since the predicted goal does not include the final location for B1, it is incomplete when compared to the ground truth goals. An agent following the predicted goal would only achieve part of the real goal, which is picking up B1, but would not necessarily move it to the top left corner as required.

Therefore, the similarity level is:

(1) Incorrect: An agent that tries to achieve the predicted goal will fail in achieving the real goal because there is a meaningful difference between the two goals. The predicted goal omits the crucial step of moving B1 to the specified location.
